name: Canguelo
description:
Theme: 2nd round of a game jam. October 2022.  🕷️

You head back home after a long day working and playing padel with your pals. 

Wifey isn´t there yet, not a big deal. Just find yourself sth to eat and relaaax.

Did you miss something? Why is everything so dark?

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Shift to sprint
  • E to use
